Text: A Unique Holiday Gift for Corporate Clients and FriendsFrom KM Hair Designs Travis T Houston TX Tel Are you wondering what to give your key corporate clients and business associates this holiday season Are you concerned that your gifts may be hung up in security conscious mailrooms Would you like to give something other than the usual gourmet food packages something that will be remembered long after the holidays This holiday season treat your associates with a K M Salon gift certificate for wonderfully relaxing massage therapy sessions Our highly skilled message therapists will pamper your associates through this truly memorable and unique gift program K M Salon has several gift certificate packages at very affordable levels Consumers spend over billion annually on visits to massage therapists usually at hotels and spas on vacation or during business meetings Your KM gift will let your associates indulge themselves at our convenient down town Houston location any time of day The Holiday Stress Reliever package The Unique Lifestyle Experience package The Im Ready For Anything package This holiday season let your gift stand out from all the rest One phone call to Patti at can conveniently meet your corporate gift needs We are contacting you as a client of KM Hair Designs hair salon If you received this message in error we sincerely apologize Simply respond to this email with No Offers in the subject line and you will not be contacted again
